original_text: And Isaac digged again the wells of water, which they had digged in the days of Abraham his father; for the Philistines had stopped them after the death of Abraham: and he called their names after the names by which his father had called them.
korean_text: 그 아버지 아브라함 때에 팠던 우물들을 다시 팠으니 이는 아브라함이 죽은 후에 블레셋 사람이 그 우물들을 메웠음이라 이삭이 그 우물들의 이름을 그의 아버지가 부르던 이름으로 불렀더라

sentences.original_text: And Isaac digged again the wells of water
which they had digged in the days of Abraham his father
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 그의 아버지 아브라함 때에 판 우물들이었으며

sentences.original_text: for the Philistines had stopped them
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 블레셋 사람들이 그것들을 막았기 때문이며

sentences.original_text: after the names by which his father had called them
